issue.title: [C++/Python] Add Table method that replaces a column with a new supplied column
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2699](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2699). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This method would produce a new table since table objects are immutable. Example:

```Java

new_column = table.column(name).cast(pa.timestamp('ms'))
new_table = table.set_column(name, new_column)
```

See discussion in https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2129#issuecomment-396423002
